treatment-md.title: Hyalomantis antsingica Svenson & Roy, 2011, n. sp.
treatment-md.article-title: Taxonomic treatment of the endemic Malagasy praying mantis genus Hyalomantis GIGLIO-TOS, 1915, with a new synonymy and the description of three new species (Mantodea, Iridopterygidae, Tropidomantinae)
